<title level="1" right="Action">[Affix a Talisman](/Actions.aspx?ID=520) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 565 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements** You must use a [repair kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=43).

</column>

---

You spend 10 minutes affixing a [talisman](/equipment/consumables/talismans) to an item, placing the item on a stable surface and using the repair kit with both hands. You can also use this activity to remove a talisman. Attaching more than one talisman to an item deactivates all the talismans. They must be removed and re-affixed before they can be used again.
name: Affix a Talisman
requirement: You must use a  repair kit .
